description: List material site inventory locations with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admin users can view all material site inventory locations. Non-admin users can view locations for material sites tied to a material supplier they belong to or a broker they belong to (via the material site).
validation_notes: Filters support comma-separated IDs where noted. Results are limited to the policy scope for the current user.

flags.name: material-site
flags.description: Filter by material site ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of IDs supported. Example: --material-site 123

flags.name: unit-of-measure
flags.description: Filter by unit of measure ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: broker-id
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: broker
flags.description: Filter by broker ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of IDs supported. Example: --broker 456

flags.name: material-supplier-id
flags.description: Filter by material supplier ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: material-supplier
flags.description: Filter by material supplier ID (comma-separated for multiple)
